title: Farm Machine Safety: Loader and Skid Steer Safety

tasks.task: Operating farm loaders and skid steer loaders safely
subtasks: Equip the loader with ROPS to prevent rollover accidents
Check tire spacing and rear ballast before using the loader
Wear a seat belt when operating a tractor with a loader or skid steer loader
Avoid raising the bucket too high when loaded
Understand how load center of gravity affects stability
Lower loads gradually when raising or lowering them
Be cautious when lifting loads near people
Secure loads when moving them around people
Adjust driving and turning techniques on slopes to prevent overturns
Keep loads low when moving on public roads
Use proper bale handling attachments for moving round bales
Lower loader and engage parking brake before servicing
Avoid walking under a raised loader or attachment
Check for hydraulic leaks and address them safely
